'''Onigiri''' {{Lang|ja=おにぎり|ja_rm=o-nigiri}} is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be obtained from the [[The Gourmet Supremos: The Deep Divers]] quest, underground near the [[Jakotsu Mine]]. The location can be found as part of [[Orobashi's Legacy: Part III]].

When [[Sayu]] cooks Onigiri, there is a chance [[Dizziness-Be-Gone no Jutsu Version 2.0]] will be created instead.

}}

==Trivia==
*Four Onigiri can be obtained via dialogue with [[Yukio]].
*It is [[Kujou Sara]]'s favorite food.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Kujou Sara|Favorite Food}}</ref>

===Etymology===
* {{w|Onigiri}} refers to Japanese rice balls that were first attested around the 11th century as ''tonjiki''.
